author: Becky Ferreira, Jordan Pearson
title: WTF Are Antibody Tests, and Can They Prove Coronavirus Immunity?
description: Researchers are working on tests that look for the body's response to Covid-19 infection, and politicians keep talking about them as a way to end lockdowns. Here's what the science says.
content: There was a time when waking up with a scratchy throat or a dry cough didnt elicit such a sense of dread, but Covid-19 has made us all hyper-aware of its symptoms. Many people have been left wondering if they are asymptomatic carriers of the disease, or if a … [+9132 chars]
